description: One of their best sellers, the Harker’s Flannel brings buttery soft warmth to the Howler table. They kept it simple enough to be a staple in your closet but added a little Howler vibe with a single button-through flap pocket on the left chest, reinforced elbow patches, contrast stitching, custom metal buttons and a hunter’s yoke on the right shoulder.
name: Howler Bros Harkers Flannel - Mens
